chapter.title: Messaging API
chapter.para: The Seam JMS Messaging API is a higher level abstraction of the JMS API to provide a number of convenience methods for creating consumers, producers, etc.

section.title: MessageBuilder
section.para: The MessageBuilder interface (org.jboss.seam.jms.MessageBuilder) is the main consolidated API for Seam JMS. It provides almost all of the background functionality for Seam JMS's features (Observer Interfaces, Routing API). In later releases there will be multiple implementations of this interface. The default implementation works against javax.naming.Context assuming running within the same local application server.
